title: Bug 17813Export Select Types does not filter but uses entire workbench
description: Bug 17813Export Select Types does not filter but uses entire workbench
OB: The select types function in Export currently doies not filter on the currentselection but rather selects all files of the filtered type.STEPS1) Create 2 Java Projects with classes2) Select one of them3) Select exportthe selected one is selected4) Filter on.javajava files in both are selected
